Did you know?

We provide budget estimates for venues to help you make an informed decision.

**Budget Estimate Includes:**

  * Venue Rental Costs
  * Food & Beverage Costs
  * Taxes and Other Fees



Our Spot Estimate tool helps plan for a budget that works best for you. Try it by pricing out a venue you like!

**Example: Salt Water Farm Vineyard**

Starting at **$8,978 **for **50** Guests

Got It!

[Forty-Five North Vineyard and WineryLake Leelanau, MI | Traverse CityRolling vineyards and award-winning wines await you at Forty-Five North Vineyard and Winery.Starting at **$7,157** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/15014/forty-five-north-vineyard-and-winery/)

[Award WinnerBohemia Manor FarmChesapeake City, MD | Eastern Shore/Chesapeake BayBohemia Manor Farm is a romantic winery and wedding venue in Chesapeake City, MD. This historical venue is tucked away on 440 acres and boasts modern luxury and scenic views of the Bohemia River.Request quoteRequest quote](/venue/15178/bohemia-manor-farm/)

[Goodwater VineyardsMosheim, TN | KnoxvillePositioned south of the Nolichucky River on Goodwater Road, the Goodwater Vineyards lie within the foothills of the Smoky Mountains in the scenic community of Mosheim and presents blissful couples an Starting at **$5,258** for **50** GuestsPrice venuePrice venue](/venue/6338/goodwater-vineyards/)
